articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description:
The Terra token has approximately doubled in price two days after its launch, even as controversy surrounding Terra and the activities of its founders continues to grow.  Terra airdropped Terra 2.0’s LUNA to holders of the network tokens of the fallen Terra Classic chain – what’s now known as Luna Classic (LUNC), and the network’s …
  New LUNA Coin Surges While Terra Controversy Escalates Read More »
articles.title: New LUNA Coin Surges While Terra Controversy Escalates

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description:
The Ethereum Foundation launched the Eth2 Beacon Chain on a public testnet yesterday, marking one of the final tests before Ethereum transitions to Proof-of-Stake later this year. The Beacon Chain, Eth2’s Proof-of-Stake consensus layer, went live on the longstanding public testnet, Ropsten.  The launch is a major milestone toward Ethereum’s highly anticipated ‘chain-merge’, which developers …
  Eth2 Beacon Chain Launches on Ropsten Testnet, Paving Way for Merge Read More »
articles.title: Eth2 Beacon Chain Launches on Ropsten Testnet, Paving Way for Merge
